caseStudies.tags: frontend development / backend development / chat / users
caseStudies.title: Automotive Enthusiast
caseStudies.description: This app connects automotive enthusiasts who have a passionate interest in cars and or other motovehicles or anything associated with them such as their manufacturers and the sort and takes pleasure in enjoying and appreciating them beyond their basic function of transportation. It includes a chat feature where by users can connect on the platform and share their opinions. It also has social features such as likes.

caseStudies.title: Bakery Shop
caseStudies.description: A client wanted to scale the business to reach a wider range of clientel and the e-comerce store was more than expected. Clients dont have to leave their comfort to make a booking and the baker has time to focus fully on the creative work fully.

caseStudies.title: Chief Chef
caseStudies.description: Dont know what to cook for a loved one or trying something new in the kitchen. This app is your kitchen companion. It offers over 300 recipes with instructions, ingredients and a video tutorial on how to prepare a dish. Have a blast.
